task.title: Managing dashboards
task.shortdesc: You can mange the dashboard to perform various tasks such as creating a folder or a dashboard, moving dashboards into folders, deleting multiple dashboards, and navigating to a folder page where you can assign folder and dashboard permissions.

task.title: Creating Folders
task.shortdesc: You can create folders to organize and group dashboards, which is helpful for managing multiple dashboards on the same Grafana instance.

ul.li: You have been assigned the role of an Administrator of Grafana.

step.cmd: Click New, and then select New Folder.
Enter a name for the folder in the Folder name field.

taskbody.postreq: You can use the folder that you created to save dashboards.

task.title: Exporting dashboards
task.shortdesc: You can export dashboards from Grafana into a JSON file to reuse in the future when required.

step.cmd: Open the dashboard that you want to export from the corresponding Folder.
Click the Share icon, and then click the Export tab.

taskbody.result: You have downloaded the dashboard as the JSON file.
taskbody.postreq: You can import the dashboard to Grafana whenever you need it in the future. See .

task.title: Importing dashboards
task.shortdesc: You can import the dashboard saved in JSON format into Grafana for further customization. Thereby, you can construct the dashboard based on your requirements.

step.cmd: Click New, and then select Import.
Click Upload dashboard JSON file and choose the dashboard JSON file stored on your computer.
step.info: Alternatively, you can locate the dashboard JSON file and then drag and drop it to the Upload dashboard JSON file field.

taskbody.result: You have imported the dashboard to Grafana.
taskbody.postreq: You can apply visualization to the dashboard. See .
